name: 黃瀅瑛
objective: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何以科學方法研究物理刺激與認知感官之間的關係，並採用信號偵測理論，進而考量人因工程於產品、系統設計之應用。
schedule:
w01     Introduction to psychophysics
w02     Psychophysical measurement of thresholds
w03     The classical psychophysical methods
w04     Exercise I- Adaptive psychophysical methods
w05     Experiment I (TBA)
w06     Classical psychophysical theory
w07     Oral presentation I
w08     The theory of signal detection
w09     Procedures and applications of TSD
w10     Exercise II- TSD & applications
w11     Experiment II (TBA)
w12     The measurement of sensory attributes
w13     Oral presentation II
w14     Psychophysical ratio scaling
w15     The psychophysical law
w16     Exercise III- Experimental setup
w17     Experiment III (TBA)　　
w18     Oral presentation III
scorePolicy:
In-class performance (30%)
Oral presentation (30%)
Final report (40%)
materials: Gescheider GA (1985). Psychophysics: Method, Theory, and Application, 2nd ed., Lawerence Earlbaum, Hillsdale.
